Author: yes_creamcheese
Text: I walked past this girl who said to her friend "How are you wearing *that*? It is *soo* fking hot now" and as someone who was wearing thermal, sweater AND wool coat, I felt very attacked!

Author: beautifulchaos22
Text: Me too, it was like 10 degrees C out this morning and I had a jacket, blanket scarf and toque on, and some little shit high schoolers walked by in shorts and a t shirt. JFC.  Also the receptionist at my doctors office asked if it was cold outside and I was like “Jane, it’s fucking cold outside AND inside”. 😞😭
